verses.verse: וַיֶּאֶסֹ֧ף <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'e-Sof gathered יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel שְׁכֶ֑מָה <S%H7927><s%> she-Che-mah; to Shechem וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called לְזִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> le-zik-Nei for the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וּלְרָאשָׁ֗יו <S%H7218><s%> u-le-ra-Shav, and for their heads וּלְשֹֽׁפְטָיו֙ <S%H8199><s%> u-le-sho-fe-Tav and for their judges וּלְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <S%H7860><s%> u-le-Sho-te-Rav, and for their officers וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <S%H3320><s%> vai-yit-yatz-tze-Vu and they presented לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei themselves before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. God

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, unto all the people כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver on the other side הַנָּהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har, of the flood יָשְׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu dwelt אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem Your fathers מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> me-'o-Lam, in old time תֶּ֛רַח <S%H8646><s%> Te-rach [even] Terah אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham וַאֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> va-'a-Vi and the father נָח֑וֹר <S%H5152><s%> na-Chor; of Nachor וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> vai-ya-'av-Du and they served אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim. other

וָ֠אֶקַּח <S%H3947><s%> Va-'ek-kach And I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבִיכֶ֤ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Chem your father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver from the other side הַנָּהָ֔ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har, of the flood וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> va-'o-Lech and led אוֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz him throughout all the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan; וָאֶרֶב va-'e-rev כוָאַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> va-'ar-Beh abundance קאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַרְע֔וֹ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'O, his seed וָֽאֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-ten- and gave ל֖וֹ lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִצְחָֽק׃ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak. him Isaac

וָאֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten And I gave לְיִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak, unto Isaac אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav; and Esau וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten and I gave לְעֵשָׂ֜ו <S%H6215><s%> le-'e-Sav unto Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> har mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir Seir לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> la-Re-shet to possess אוֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וְיַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> ve-ya-'a-Ko it but Jacob וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav and his children יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> ya-re-Du went down מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. into Egypt

וָאֶשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> va-'esh-Lach I sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron also and Aaron וָאֶגֹּ֣ף <S%H5062><s%> va-'eg-Gof and I plagued אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher according to that which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti I did בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bo; among וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char them and afterward הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tze-ti I brought you out אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

וָֽאוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> va-'o-Tzi And I brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo-'u and ye came הַיָּ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah; unto the sea וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-de-Fu pursued מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian אַחֲרֵ֧י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers בְּרֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> be-Re-chev with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> u-ve-fa-ra-Shim and horsemen יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> Suf. unto the Red

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-'a-Ku And when they cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem he put מַֽאֲפֵ֜ל <S%H3990><s%> ma-'a-Fel darkness בֵּינֵיכֶ֣ם׀ <S%H996><s%> bei-nei-Chem between וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַמִּצְרִ֗ים <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Rim, between you and the Egyptians וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve and brought עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam the sea וַיְכַסֵּ֔הוּ <S%H3680><s%> vay-chas-Se-hu, upon them and covered וַתִּרְאֶ֙ינָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> vat-tir-'Ei-nah have seen עֵינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Chem, them and your eyes אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti what I have done בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וַתֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> vat-te-she-Vu and ye dwelt בַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> vam-mid-Bar in the wilderness יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim season רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim. a long

וָאָבִאָה va-'a-vi-'ah כוָאָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> va-'a-Vi abide קאֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz you into the land הָאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev which dwelt בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu and they fought אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; and I וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten with you and I gave אוֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam בְּיֶדְכֶם֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-yed-Chem them into your hand וַתִּֽירְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> vat-ti-re-Shu that ye might possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam, their land וָאַשְׁמִידֵ֖ם <S%H8045><s%> va-'ash-mi-Dem and I destroyed מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Chem. them from before

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose בָּלָ֤ק <S%H1111><s%> ba-Lak Then Balak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צִפּוֹר֙ <S%H6834><s%> tzip-pOr of Zippor מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-La-chem and warred בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El; against Israel וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach, and sent וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called לְבִלְעָ֥ם <S%H1109><s%> le-vil-'Am Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בְּע֖וֹר <S%H1160><s%> be-'or of Beor לְקַלֵּ֥ל <S%H7043><s%> le-kal-Lel to curse אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo was not אָבִ֖יתִי <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vi-ti But I would לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a' not hearken לְבִלְעָ֑ם <S%H1109><s%> le-vil-'Am; unto Balaam וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech therefore he blessed בָּרוֹךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> ba-roCh you still אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, וָאַצִּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> va-'atz-Tzil so I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Do. you out of his hand

וַתַּעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> vat-ta-'av-Ru And ye went over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan וַתָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְרִיחוֹ֒ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho unto Jericho וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu fought בָכֶ֣ם va-Chem בַּעֲלֵֽי־ <S%H1167><s%> ba-'a-lei- and the men יְ֠רִיחוֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-cho of Jericho הָֽאֱמֹרִ֨י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri against you the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֜י <S%H6522><s%> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi and the Perizzites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <S%H3669><s%> ve-hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, and the Canaanites וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> ve-ha-chit-Ti and the Hittites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֔י <S%H1622><s%> ve-hag-gir-ga-Shi, and the Girgashites הַֽחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si; and the Jebusites וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten and I delivered אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-yed-Chem. them into your hand

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> va-'esh-Lach And I sent לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַצִּרְעָ֔ה <S%H6880><s%> hatz-tzir-'Ah, the hornet וַתְּגָ֤רֶשׁ <S%H1644><s%> vat-te-Ga-resh you which drave them out אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Chem, from before שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei you [even] the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri; of the Amorites לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo by בְחַרְבְּךָ֖ <S%H2719><s%> ve-char-be-Cha [but] not with thy sword וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or בְקַשְׁתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7198><s%> ve-kash-Te-cha. nor with thy bow
